conbody.p: The Architect-Engineer topic page on the GSA Acquisition Portal at https://insite.gsa.gov/acquisitionportal contains specific job aids, which must be used to ensure consistent application of the 6 percent fee limitation in accordance with FAR Part 15.404-4(c)(4)(i)(B), for architect-engineer services for public works or utilities for production and delivery of designs, plans, drawings, and specifications.
